title: Judged By Your Peers
description: Shay believes she has the worse secret in the world, but unable to keep it in anymore she confides in her work friends that her marriage is failing because she's gay. The response Shay gets is overwhelming, in more ways than one: Her friends take this opportunity to confide in Shay their secrets: An Alcoholic, An Adulterer, A Thief, A Racial Extremist and â€¦ A Paedophile???
author: L.M. Steel
